sn48.52:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava mallesu viharati uruvelakappam nama mallanam nigamo.
sn48.52:1.4: “yavakivanca, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa ariyananam na uppannam hoti neva tava catunnam indriyanam santhiti hoti, neva tava catunnam indriyanam avatthiti hoti.
sn48.52:1.5: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa ariyananam uppannam hoti, atha catunnam indriyanam santhiti hoti, atha catunnam indriyanam avatthiti hoti.
sn48.52:2.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yavakivanca kutagarassa kutam na ussitam hoti, neva tava gopanasinam santhiti hoti, neva tava gopanasinam avatthiti hoti.
sn48.52:2.2: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, kutagarassa kutam ussitam hoti, atha gopanasinam santhiti hoti, atha gopanasinam avatthiti hoti.
sn48.52:2.3: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yavakivanca ariyasavakassa ariyananam na uppannam hoti, neva tava catunnam indriyanam santhiti hoti, neva tava catunnam indriyanam avatthiti hoti.
sn48.52:2.4: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa ariyananam uppannam hoti, atha catunnam indriyanam …pe… avatthiti hoti.
sn48.52:3.3: Pannavato, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa tadanvaya saddha santhati, tadanvayam viriyam santhati, tadanvaya sati santhati, tadanvayo samadhi santhati”ti.
